attributes.action: Link Heathrow and Gatwick by High Speed train to create one super hub airport
attributes.additional_details: Until its declared impossible, let's develop what we have. If HS2 is possible, then this is possible and it enhances our nation's global importance.
attributes.background: We need more capacity for global air travel through London. Heathrow is big enough. Gatwick has space for another runway. High speed train technology and tunnels are solutions now. Link the two airports as one.
